name: cnfldsrngadd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(caddc, cfv(cplusg, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, co(ccnfld, cress, c0))
-| wceq(caddc, cfv(cplusg, ccnfld))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(caddc, cfv(cplusg, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, co(ccnfld, cress, c0))
-| wceq(caddc, cfv(cplusg, ccnfld))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(caddc, cfv(cplusg, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, co(ccnfld, cress, c0))

comment: The group addition operation of a subring of the field of complex numbers. (Contributed by AV, 31-Jan-2020.)
